summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on August 10, 2011. The email contains a brief message regarding 'merkin' and includes a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be attorney-client privileged. The communication emphasizes the confidential nature of the content and prohibits unauthorized use.
